items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great style and comfort
items.body: Soft comfy sweater. The medium fits me well. Read more
items.author: Anna

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not very flattering, but good quality wool-blend
items.body: -The current price point of about $40 USD is actually not bad for wool-blend, even as little as 4% -The fit is a little on the big side for a US women's medium. I think it fits more like a large, but it will shrink a little I assume (haven't washed it yet just bc of the wool) -The color like the pictures, murky blue-green, very nice. -The buttons are big which highlights the slanted enclosure. I might change the buttons to something more exciting, these are sort of boring. -The shoulders are a drop seam which I don't LOVE, but it's fine. It's not really intended to be flattering lol. -I wore it open over a button-up shirt so it just looked like I pulled it on crooked, which was actually fine lol. -It kept me decently warm. -Almost everything I receive from Cider is sized appropriately for US women, and of good quality, with very few exceptions. -Overall, this cardigan is nice if you choose to wear it closed, wearing it open is fine too but it doesn't hang evenly which could bother some people. Read more
items.author: SW

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, comfortable and lovely looking unique sweater.
items.body: CIDER Womens Knit Cardigan Trendy Crew Neck Button Down Long Sleeve Cozy Fall Fashion Sweater Loose Fit Wool Top……… I love Cider clothing, I own quite a bit of it. I always find it to be well made, stylish and true to size, this sweater is no exception. This sweater is soft, cozy and warm with a cute diagonal button front for a unique twist on the traditional cardigan. The green color is beautiful and earthy, the material is mostly polyester and acrylic, with 4% wool but it feels like a soft, luxurious wool blend. It washed well following the garment care instructions with no shrinking or deformation of its shape. This is a lovely and comfortable sweater that is well worth the price and I recommend it. Read more
items.author: Mel See

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s ok.
items.body: Cute at first. Must wear something underneath for large chested bc it does tend to open up. Have not washed it to know how it holds up. Read more
items.author: Ani Galyan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy knit cardigan with trendy details, but lightweight and oversized for petite frames
items.body: This CIDER women’s knit cardigan has a stylish crew neck and button-down design that’s great for layering in fall. The wool blend is soft and breathable, but the weight is lighter than expected—more of a fashion sweater than a true cold-weather layer. The loose fit gives it a relaxed look, but it runs oversized, especially in the sleeves and body. For petite wearers, it may feel bulky or shapeless. The quality is decent for the price, and the buttons add a nice touch, but the overall look is more casual than polished. Good for cozy indoor wear, but not ideal if you're looking for structure or warmth. Washes well. Read more
items.author: Rachel M.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute!
items.body: I love this! It fits great and the quality gives fall! It's so cute for a good going out outfit as well! Read more
items.author: Doris B

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really like the asymmetric button line!
items.body: This is a women's cardigan top, size medium, color dark green. I am 5'5", 150 lbs, 34B. I like this cardigan as the fit is good but not loose. It is warm, and the sleeve and hem lengths are good for me. I like the feel of the wool blend, and especially the asymmetrical button line which makes it unique. Some other aspects I like: 1. The hang tags are on a string looped through the use and care tag (at bottom of left inner seam), rather than using a plastic T-strap which makes a hole in the fabric. 2. There is a QR code on the use and care tag which I tried. I thought it would go to the seller's site, but it goes to the original Amazon listing page. This would be helpful if someone asked where I got the cardigan, I can just have them scan the code to go right to the order page. 3. Use and care information is on the tag in both text as well as universal care symbols. 4. An extra button is provided! The only minus is that the creases from being in a vacuum flat-pack are taking a long time to work out. I have had this hanging up now over a week and there are still significant creases. I am pleased with this and look forward to wearing it for different occasions. Read more
items.author: Rick Mills

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Awful material
items.body: Never mind that this took almost 2 months to arrive between purchasing, waiting, canceling, repurchasing, more waiting....the material felt slimy and misshapen. The green was a very nice color, but not enough to give it more than one star. Read more
items.author: Zazzleberry

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
